suite.name: Cadastro

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

Get Product Json
Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${json} = {u'name': u'Donkey Kong', u'price': u'49.99', u'cat': u'Super Nintendo', u'producers': [u'Rare', u'Nintendo'], u'image': u'donkey-kong.jpg', u'desc': u'Um jogo muito divertido!'}
${product_json} = {u'name': u'Donkey Kong', u'price': u'49.99', u'cat': u'Super Nintendo', u'producers': [u'Rare', u'Nintendo'], u'image': u'donkey-kong.jpg', u'desc': u'Um jogo muito divertido!'}

Get Product Json

kw.msg: ${file} = { "name": "Mario Bros", "cat": "Nintendo", "price": "79.99", "desc": "Impossível terminar esse jogo sem save. HAHAHA", "producers": ["Nintendo"], "image": "mario1.jpg" }

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${json} = {u'name': u'Mario Bros', u'price': u'79.99', u'cat': u'Nintendo', u'producers': [u'Nintendo'], u'image': u'mario1.jpg', u'desc': u'Imposs\xedvel terminar esse jogo sem save. HAHAHA'}

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key TAB to element.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Impossível terminar esse jogo sem save. HAHAHA' into text field 'css:textarea[name=description]'.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

Wait Until Element Does Not Contain
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

suite.doc: Exclusão de produtos Sendo um administrador de catálogo que possui produtos indesejados Quero deletar estes produtos Para que eu possa manter meu catálogo atualizado
